Description: cell abundance for a particular (phytoplankton) taxonomic type
bio-volume for a particular (phytoplankton) taxonomic type
carbon concentration for a particular (phytoplankton) taxonomic type
Coefficient of Variation. Append '_cv' to the end of the field name it describes e.g. bb532_cv
Standard Deviation. Append '_sd' to the end of the field name it describes e.g. chl_sd
Standard Error. Append '_se' to the end of the field name it describes
